sentences.en: Gary: The state legislature just a law for it.
sentences.cn: 盖瑞 ︰ 州议院刚刚才通过法案.

sentences.en: He is a member of the upper house of legislature.
sentences.cn: 他是上议院的成员之一.

sentences.en: He was an outstanding member of the legislature.
sentences.cn: 他是立法机关的杰出成员.

sentences.en: In his report Mr. B explained the action taken by the legislature.
sentences.cn: 在他报告中,B先生解释立法当局所采取的行动.

sentences.en: In Vermont, the state legislature successfully overrode the governor's promised veto.
sentences.cn: 在佛蒙特州, 州立法机构推翻了州长在选举时承诺的否决票.

sentences.en: Regional executive legislature is the best choice in the legal coordination means.
sentences.cn: 而在法制协调手段中,区域行政立法的形式是最佳选择.

sentences.en: The bill passed both houses of the Legislature in June with little fanfare or debate.
sentences.cn: 6月份立法两院未经辩论悄悄地通过了此项议案.

sentences.en: The constitution provides for an elected two - chamber legislature.
sentences.cn: 宪法规定设置经选举产生的两院制立法机构.

sentences.en: The Legislature acted just before the end of its current session.
sentences.cn: 议院在最近一期的会期结束时才开始动作.

sentences.en: The legislature is housed in an impressive granite edifice.
sentences.cn: 立法机构位于一幢引人注目的花岗岩大楼里.

sentences.en: The legislature passed a law to aBolish the surtax.
sentences.cn: 立法机关通过了一项废除附加税的法令.

sentences.en: The legislature repealed the unpopular Rent Act.
sentences.cn: 立法机关废除了不得人心的租借法案.

sentences.en: The proposals before the legislature include the creation of two special courts to deal exclusively with violent crimes.
sentences.cn: 呈交立法机关的提案内容包括成立两个专门审理暴力犯罪的特别法庭。

sentences.en: The State legislature has been summoned.
They have their own local legislature.
sentences.cn: 他们有自己的地方议会机构.

trans.tran_cn: 立法机关，立法机构，立法部，（特指）州议会
trans.tran_en: an institution that has the power to make or change laws
